sentence: Governor John Fetterman, a progressive U.S. Senate candidate, voiced support Friday for permanently boosting the Child Tax Credit after research showed that Congress' failure to extend the enhanced benefit caused child poverty to spike in January.
author: Jake Johnson
title: Fetterman Calls for Permanent Expansion of Enhanced Child Tax Credit

author: Ryan Deto
title: Pittsburgh market has seen the most ads in high-stakes Senate race

author: Marc Levy
title: Debate Exposes Democrats' Differences in Pa.'s U.S. Senate Race

sentence: PA Lt. Gov John Fetterman (who is running for US Senate) looks thrilled to be at the Easter Egg Roll.
author: Matt Vespa
title: Democrats Appear to Be Testing Progressive Populism In PA Senate Race
